==Events==
*[[1071]] &ndash; [[Battle of Manzikert]]: The [[Seljuk Turks]] defeat the [[Byzantine Army]] at [[Manzikert]].
*[[1278]] &ndash; [[Ladislaus IV of Hungary]] and [[Rudolph I of Germany]] defeat [[Premysl Ottokar II]] of [[Bohemia]] in the [[Battle of Marchfield]] near [[Dürnkrut]] in (then) [[Moravia]].
*[[1303]] &ndash; [[Ala ud din Khilji]] captures [[Chittorgarh]].
*[[1346]] &ndash; [[Hundred Years' War]]: the military supremacy of the English [[longbow]] over the French combination of [[crossbow]] and armoured [[knight]]s is established at the [[Battle of Crécy]].
*[[1444]] &ndash; [[Battle of St. Jakob an der Birs]]: A vastly outnumbered force of Swiss Confederates is defeated by the Dauphin Louis (future [[Louis XI of France]]) and his army of 'Armagnacs' near [[Basel]].
*[[1466]] &ndash; A conspiracy against [[Piero di Cosimo de' Medici]] in Florence, led by [[Luca Pitti]], is discovered.
*[[1498]] &ndash; [[Michelangelo]] is commissioned to carve the [[Pietà (Michelangelo)|Pietà]].
*[[1748]] &ndash; The first [[Lutheran]] denomination in North America, the [[Pennsylvania Ministerium]], is founded in [[Philadelphia, Pennsylvania]].
*[[1768]] &ndash; [[James Cook|Captain James Cook]] [[First voyage of James Cook|sets sail]] from England on board {{HMS|Endeavour}}.
*[[1778]] &ndash; The first recorded ascent of [[Triglav]], the highest mountain in [[Slovenia]].
*[[1789]] &ndash; The [[Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen]] is approved by the National Constituent Assembly of France.
*[[1791]] &ndash; [[John Fitch (inventor)|John Fitch]] is granted a United States patent for the [[steamboat]].
*[[1810]] &ndash; The former viceroy [[Santiago de Liniers]] of the [[Viceroyalty of the Río de la Plata]] is executed after the defeat of his [[Liniers Counter-revolution|counter-revolution]].
*[[1813]] &ndash; [[War of the Sixth Coalition]]: An [[Battle of Katzbach|impromptu battle]] takes place when French and Prussian-Russian forces accidentally run into each other near [[Liegnitz]], Prussia (now Legnica, Poland).
*[[1814]] &ndash; [[Chilean War of Independence]]: Infighting between the rebel forces of [[José Miguel Carrera]] and [[Bernardo O'Higgins]] erupts in the [[Battle of Las Tres Acequias]].
*[[1821]] &ndash; The [[University of Buenos Aires]], [[Argentina]], is officially opened.
*[[1883]] &ndash; The [[1883 eruption of Krakatoa]] begins its final, paroxysmal, stage.
*[[1914]] &ndash; In [[Brazil]], [[Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras]] is founded.
*  1914   &ndash; World War I: the German [[colony]] of [[Togoland]] is invaded by French and [[United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland|British]] forces, who take it after 5 days.
*[[1920]] &ndash; The [[Nineteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution|19th amendment]] to [[United States Constitution]] takes effect, giving women the right to vote.
*[[1940]] &ndash; [[Chad]] becomes the first French [[colony]] to join the Allies under the administration of [[Félix Éboué]], France's first black colonial [[governor]].
*[[1942]] &ndash; [[Holocaust]] in Chortkiav, western [[Ukraine]]: At 2.30 am the German [[Schutzpolizei]] starts driving [[Jews]] out of their houses, divides them into groups of 120, packs them in freight cars and deports 2000 to [[Belzec extermination camp|Belzec]] death camp. 500 of the sick and children are murdered on the spot.
*[[1944]] &ndash; [[World War II]]: [[Charles de Gaulle]] enters Paris.
*[[1966]] &ndash; The [[Namibian War of Independence]] starts with the battle at [[Omugulugwombashe]].
*[[1970]] &ndash; The [[Feminist Movement in the United States (1963–1982)|then new feminist movement]], led by [[Betty Friedan]], leads a nation-wide [[Women's Strike for Equality]].
*[[1977]] &ndash; The [[Charter of the French Language]] is adopted by the [[National Assembly of Quebec]]
*[[1978]] &ndash; [[Papal conclave, 1978 (August)|Papal conclave]]: [[Pope John Paul I]] is elected to the [[Papacy]].
*  1978   &ndash; [[Sigmund Jähn]] becomes first German [[astronaut|cosmonaut]], on board [[Soyuz 31]].
*[[1980]] &ndash; John Birges [[Harvey's Resort Hotel bombing|plants a bomb]] at [[Harveys Lake Tahoe|Harvey's Resort Hotel]] in [[Stateline, Nevada]], US.
*[[1997]] &ndash; [[Beni-Ali massacre]] in [[Algeria]]; 60-100 people killed.
*[[1999]] &ndash; Russia begins the [[Second Chechen War]] in response to the [[Invasion of Dagestan]] by the [[Islamic International Peacekeeping Brigade]].
*[[2002]] &ndash; [[Earth Summit]] 2002 begins in [[Johannesburg]], South Africa
*[[2011]] &ndash; The [[Boeing 787 Dreamliner]], Boeing's all-new composite airliner, receives certification from the [[European Aviation Safety Agency|EASA]] and the [[Federal Aviation Administration|FAA]]
